TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyBuilder extends System.Reflection.PropertyInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._PropertyBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyBuilder Inherits PropertyInfo Implements _PropertyBuilder
public ref class PropertyBuilder sealed : System::Reflection::PropertyInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_PropertyBuilder

summary.span: 定义类型的属性。

span.span: Defines the properties for a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`PropertyBuilder`始终与`TypeBuilder`。A `PropertyBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`. `TypeBuilder`。The `TypeBuilder`. `DefineProperty` 方法将返回一个新`PropertyBuilder`到客户端。`DefineProperty` method will return a new `PropertyBuilder` to a client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现中使用的动态类型的属性`PropertyBuilder`获取通过创建属性框架和一个关联实现于该属性的 IL 逻辑。The following code sample demonstrates how to implement properties in a dynamic type using a `PropertyBuilder` obtained via to create the property framework and an associated to implement the IL logic within the property. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的属性访问器，在该属性的父类型使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 上反映、 反射属性对象检索、 类型和调用 PropertyInfo.GetAccessors。To get the accessors of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetAccessors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是为用户提供为方便起见。This property is provided as a convenience for the user. 它相当于使用属性用于获取在其中声明该属性的类型并调用属性生成对象。It is equivalent to using the property to get the type in which the property is declared, and then calling the property of the resulting object.

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 此属性的默认值。

span.span: The default value of this property.

summary.span: 设置该属性的默认值。

span.span: Sets the default value of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 限制为以下类型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. 如果该属性类型是引用类型，需要 CLS 遵从性`defaultValue`要`null`。If the property type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 但是，从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`对于引用类型，只要该值可以分配给该引用类型可以为非 null。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for reference types as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如，`Int32`值可以分配给类型的属性。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a property of type . 这不符合 CLS，但它可以是互操作方案中十分有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

span.span: has been called on the enclosing type.

exception.span: 该属性不是受支持类型之一。

-or-

-or-

exception.span: 该属性的类型为 或其他引用类型，并且 不是 ，该值无法赋给引用类型。

span.span: The property is of type or other reference type, is not , and the value cannot be assigned to the reference type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何设置格式，请参阅 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档，有关详细信息中的元数据规范`binaryAttribute`。See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`. 第 ii 部分文档也请可用 MSDN 上 ([ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65555)网页) 和 ECMA 网站上 ([标准 ecma-335 公共语言基础结构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65552)文档）。The Partition II documentation is available online on MSDN ([ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65555) Web page) and on the ECMA Web site ([Standard ECMA-335 Common Language Infrastructure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65552) document).

span.span: or is .
has been called on the enclosing type.

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
